title: The feel when scuttle crab jukes your skillshot
body: The feel when scuttle crab jukes your skillshot that would've killed it and then you have to rethink your entire life because you wont make it to lcs because of it

replies.body:
Faker misses q while farming as ryze

You are fine
I tried to think of a better explanation than this, but.... I can't
Even LCS players get juked by Scuttle Crab. You're fine m8

Don't worry, pretty sure I just watched Reignover miss the scuttle last hit with Rek'sai Q, so don't let scuttle's ninja skills deter you! 

Unfortunately that isn't the only thing stopping me from being LCS material...

> [{quoted}](name=Zirzon,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=nwKWAa3V,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-03-13T06:03:37.625+0000)
>
> Don't worry, pretty sure I just watched Reignover miss the scuttle last hit with Rek'sai Q, so don't let scuttle's ninja skills deter you! 
> 
> Unfortunately that isn't the only thing stopping me from being LCS material...

http://img.pandawhale.com/58669-so-youre-telling-me-theres-a-c-Sm9B.gif
I think the worst thing I've ever done in League was forget I had quick-cast on, and miss a ward. And I've done it at least 20 times.

Scuttle's movement is so weird that i've been juked countless times by him. I mean not only the direction and speed but also how it looks fools you into throwing skillshots the wrong way too many times. Its pure troll yet totally fitting from a theme standpoint, try catching crabs, you'll see what i mean.
